表格Tab_MoneyPool的代码预览

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('Tab_MoneyPool')
and type = 'U')
drop table Tab_MoneyPool
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: Tab_MoneyPool */
/*==============================================================*/
create table Tab_MoneyPool (
MP_ID int identity,
MP_Money decimal(15,2) null,
MP_Handler varchar(100) null,
MP_Date datetime null,
MP_Memo varchar(500) null,
MP_Flag int null,
Column_7 char(10) null,
constraint PK_TAB_MONEYPOOL primary key (MP_ID)
)
go

declare @CurrentUser sysname
select @CurrentUser = user_name()
execute sp_addextendedproperty 'MS_Description',
'资金池表单',
'user', @CurrentUser, 'table', 'Tab_MoneyPool'
go

declare @CurrentUser sysname
select @CurrentUser = user_name()
execute sp_addextendedproperty 'MS_Description',
'资金池主键ID',
'user', @CurrentUser, 'table', 'Tab_MoneyPool', 'column', 'MP_ID'
go

declare @CurrentUser sysname
select @CurrentUser = user_name()
execute sp_addextendedproperty 'MS_Description',
'资金',
'user', @CurrentUser, 'table', 'Tab_MoneyPool', 'column', 'MP_Money'
go

declare @CurrentUser sysname
select @CurrentUser = user_name()
execute sp_addextendedproperty 'MS_Description',
'经手人',
'user', @CurrentUser, 'table', 'Tab_MoneyPool', 'column', 'MP_Handler'
go

declare @CurrentUser sysname
select @CurrentUser = user_name()
execute sp_addextendedproperty 'MS_Description',
'日期',
'user', @CurrentUser, 'table', 'Tab_MoneyPool', 'column', 'MP_Date'
go

declare @CurrentUser sysname
select @CurrentUser = user_name()
execute sp_addextendedproperty 'MS_Description',
'备注',
'user', @CurrentUser, 'table', 'Tab_MoneyPool', 'column', 'MP_Memo'
go

declare @CurrentUser sysname
select @CurrentUser = user_name()
execute sp_addextendedproperty 'MS_Description',
'判断出入的标识（1为入，0为出）',
'user', @CurrentUser, 'table', 'Tab_MoneyPool', 'column', 'MP_Flag'
go
